title: Jena Griswold
added: In 2019, Jena worked with the legislature to pass:
•[[The Clean Campaign Act]] of 2019 helps shine light on dark money and requires corporations
•[[The Lobbyist Transparency Act]] gives Coloradans better information about who is working
•[[Automatic Voter Registration]] increases eligible Coloradans' access to register to vote.
•[[Colorado Votes Act]] adds polling locations and mail-in ballot drop boxes across the state,
guaranteeing them on all public universities and tribal lands.
In 2020, Jena was known as the "[[Dr. Fauci]] of vote-by-mail" and worked to expand mail ballots across the nation.
